panel.title: Enabled Accounts with No Login for 6 Months

search.query: `activedirectory_users` earliest=-48h [ search `activedirectory_users` earliest=-48h | stats latest(taskid) AS taskid] NOT useraccountcontrol{} IN (ACCOUNTDISABLE) | eval pwdlastset_epoch=strptime(pwdlastset,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%f") | eval pwdlastset_days=round((now()-pwdlastset_epoch)/86400,0) | eval lastlogontimestamp_epoch=strptime(lastlogontimestamp,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%f") | eval lastlogontimestamp_days=round((now()-lastlogontimestamp_epoch)/86400,0) | table samaccountname, description, useraccountcontrol{}, accountexpires, lastlogontimestamp,lastlogontimestamp_epoch,lastlogontimestamp_days, pwdlastset, pwdlastset_epoch,pwdlastset_days, whencreated, whenchanged | where lastlogontimestamp_days>180 | bucket span=1y lastlogontimestamp_epoch | chart count by lastlogontimestamp_epoch | eval lastlogontimestamp_epoch=strftime(lastlogontimestamp_epoch,"%Y")

panel.title: Enabled Accounts with Login Last 30 days and Password Not Change in More than 1 Year

search.query: `activedirectory_users` earliest=-48h [ search `activedirectory_users` earliest=-48h | stats latest(taskid) AS taskid] NOT useraccountcontrol{} IN (ACCOUNTDISABLE) | eval pwdlastset_epoch=strptime(pwdlastset,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%f") | eval pwdlastset_days=round((now()-pwdlastset_epoch)/86400,0) | eval lastlogontimestamp_epoch=strptime(lastlogontimestamp,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%f") | eval lastlogontimestamp_days=round((now()-lastlogontimestamp_epoch)/86400,0) | table samaccountname, description, useraccountcontrol{}, accountexpires, lastlogontimestamp,lastlogontimestamp_epoch,lastlogontimestamp_days, pwdlastset, pwdlastset_epoch,pwdlastset_days, whencreated, whenchanged | where lastlogontimestamp_days<30 AND pwdlastset_days>365 | bucket span=1mon pwdlastset_epoch | chart count by pwdlastset_epoch | eval pwdlastset_epoch=strftime(pwdlastset_epoch,"%Y-%m")

`activedirectory_users` earliest=-48h [ search `activedirectory_users` earliest=-48h | stats latest(taskid) AS taskid] NOT useraccountcontrol{} IN (ACCOUNTDISABLE) | eval pwdlastset_epoch=strptime(pwdlastset,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%f") | eval pwdlastset_days=round((now()-pwdlastset_epoch)/86400,0) | eval lastlogontimestamp_epoch=strptime(lastlogontimestamp,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%f") | eval lastlogontimestamp_days=round((now()-lastlogontimestamp_epoch)/86400,0) | eval whencreated_epoch=strptime(whencreated,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") | eval whencreated_days=round((now()-whencreated_epoch)/86400,0) | eval whenchanged_epoch=strptime(whenchanged,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") | eval whenchanged_days=round((now()-whenchanged_epoch)/86400,0) | table samaccountname, description, useraccountcontrol{}, accountexpires, lastlogontimestamp,lastlogontimestamp_epoch,lastlogontimestamp_days, pwdlastset, pwdlastset_epoch,pwdlastset_days, whencreated, whencreated_days, whenchanged, whenchanged_days | eval created_days_ago=whencreated_days | stats count AS users, list(samaccountname) AS samaccountname by created_days_ago | sort created_days_ago

`activedirectory_users` earliest=-48h [ search `activedirectory_users` earliest=-48h | stats latest(taskid) AS taskid] NOT useraccountcontrol{} IN (ACCOUNTDISABLE) pwdlastset="(never)" | eval pwdlastset_epoch=strptime(pwdlastset,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%f") | eval pwdlastset_days=round((now()-pwdlastset_epoch)/86400,0) | eval lastlogontimestamp_epoch=strptime(lastlogontimestamp,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%f") | eval lastlogontimestamp_days=round((now()-lastlogontimestamp_epoch)/86400,0) | table samaccountname, description, useraccountcontrol{}, accountexpires, lastlogontimestamp,lastlogontimestamp_epoch,lastlogontimestamp_days, pwdlastset, pwdlastset_epoch,pwdlastset_days, whencreated, whenchanged

panel.title: Accounts with Possible Password in Description

search.query: `activedirectory_users` earliest=-48h [ search `activedirectory_users` earliest=-48h | stats latest(taskid) AS taskid] description IN ("*pw*", "*pwd*", "*!*", "*$*", "*@@*", "*=*", "*2016", "*2017", "*2018", "*2019", "*summer*","*winter*","*fall*","*spring*" ) | table samaccountname, description, useraccountcontrol{}, accountexpires, lastlogontimestamp, pwdlastset, whencreated, whenchanged

panel.title: Enabled Accounts with No Password Required and Not Set

search.query: `activedirectory_users` earliest=-48h@h [ search `activedirectory_users` earliest=-48h@h | eval taskid=coalesce(taskid,_time) | fields taskid | dedup taskid | head 1 | table taskid] useraccountcontrol{} IN (PASSWD_NOTREQD) NOT useraccountcontrol{} IN (ACCOUNTDISABLE) pwdlastset=0 | table objectsid, domain, name, samaccountname, lastlogontimestamp, pwdlastset, whencreated, whenchanged, useraccountcontrol{}

panel.title: Enabled Domain Computers by Operating System

search.query: `activedirectory_computers` earliest=-48h@h [ search `activedirectory_computers` earliest=-48h@h | stats latest(taskid) AS taskid] NOT useraccountcontrol{} IN (ACCOUNTDISABLE) operatingsystem=* | stats count by operatingsystem | sort - count

`activedirectory_admin_groups` earliest=-48h OR [search `activedirectory_admin_groups` earliest=-48h | stats latest(taskid) AS taskid by admin_group_dn] | table admin_group_dn, name, samaccountname, objectcategory, objectclass{}, objectsid | join objectsid type=outer [ search `activedirectory_users` earliest=-48h [ search `activedirectory_users` earliest=-48h | stats latest(taskid) AS taskid ] | table objectsid, "useraccountcontrol{}" ] | join admin_group_dn type=outer [ search `activedirectory_groups` earliest=-48h [ search `activedirectory_groups` earliest=-48h | stats latest(taskid) AS taskid ] | eval admin_group_name=name | eval admin_group_sid=objectsid | eval admin_group_dn=distinguishedname | table admin_group_dn, admin_group_sid, admin_group_name ] | table admin_group_name, admin_group_sid, name, samaccountname, objectsid, objectclass{}, useraccountcontrol{} | search objectclass{} IN ("person") | eval disabled=if(isnull(mvfind('useraccountcontrol{}',"ACCOUNTDISABLE")),""," (disabled)") | eval user=samaccountname+disabled, group=admin_group_name | stats list(user) as user by admin_group_name
